item.description:
Happy New Year from Finda Cloud! As we step into 2026, we‚Äôre excited to introduce a new face for the journey ahead: the Finda Buddy. Inspired by the cloud in our company logo, we created this little one to bring a human touch to the "invisible" world of cloud software, turning abstract technology into something friendly and approachable. Whether he‚Äôs serving as your go-to companion for solving complex challenges or acting as a physical reminder that powerful software should be lightweight and stress-free, the Finda Buddy is here to scale alongside you this year. Thank you for being part of our story, we can‚Äôt wait to reach new heights together in 2026!

item.title: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's A...
item.description: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet! Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap. It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security. Why AIShieldNet? - Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks. - Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats. - Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns. Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region. Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats! https://prosfinity.com/ hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #Prosfinity hashtag #AIShieldNet hashtag #Cybersecurity hashtag #AI hashtag #ZDR hashtag #EDR hashtag #APAC hashtag #Partnership hashtag #ZeroDayAttack
item.content:encoded: We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet! Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap. It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security. Why AIShieldNet? - Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks. - Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats. - Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns. Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region. Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats! https://prosfinity.com/ hashtag #FindaCloud hashtag #Prosfinity hashtag #AIShieldNet hashtag #Cybersecurity hashtag #AI hashtag #ZDR hashtag #EDR hashtag #APAC hashtag #Partnership hashtag #ZeroDayAttack

item.description: üåü Thank You for a Successful Finda Cloud Technology Solution Day! üåü Last Friday, we had the pleasure of hosting our Finda Cloud Solution Day at the Sheraton Hong Kong Hotel & Towers. The event was a fantastic opportunity for professionals across the industry to come together and explore the latest advancements in cloud technology. üè®‚ú® We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to all the sponsors, Freshworks, TeamViewer, Tencent Cloud, Vimeo, KYOCERA Document Solutions Hong Kong Limited, SurveySparrow, Graylog, Inc., PCCW GLOBAL Limited Console Connect , HAND Global Solutions, who set up booths and showcased their innovative solutions. Your engaging product introductions provided invaluable insights and sparked inspiring conversations among attendees. It‚Äôs your expertise and dedication that drive our industry forward! To all participants, thank you for your enthusiasm and active engagement. Your presence made the event truly special, and we hope you left with new knowledge, connections, and ideas to implement in your organizations. Events like these remind us of the power of collaboration and community. We are excited about the partnerships forged and the collective growth that lies ahead as we navigate this ever-evolving landscape together. We look forward to more opportunities to connect, learn, and innovate. Stay tuned for upcoming events and initiatives from Finda Cloud Technology! item.description: Looking for a smarter, more cost-effective alternative to traditional CAPTCHA systems? We bring you a cutting-edge CAPTCHA solution designed for robust security and seamless integration.
